admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would help to finance
            expansion of five educational institutions (in agricultural,
            health, primary and secondary teacher training, and
            technical fields) and, in addition, would support planning
            and studies essential to long-term development of the
            education and training sector, including an experimental
            program at five Rural Vocational Centers. Altogether the
            project includes 21-1/2 years of specialist services and
            9-1/2 years of fellowships to strengthen staff and
            curriculum development.
